channel.title: microjs on Micro Services
channel.description: Recent content in microjs on Micro Services

item.title: chat Micro.js
item.description: Real time messaging API which enables Chat services to be embedded anywhere

item.title: etas Micro.js
item.description: ETAs as a service. Provides single-pickup and multi-dropoff routes. Takes into account time and traffic.

item.title: feeds Micro.js
item.description: A single uniform API for crawling and indexing RSS feeds

item.title: geocoding Micro.js
item.description: Geocode an address to gps coordinates and the reverse. Geocoding service The geocoding service provides address to lat lng geocoding as well as the reverse.

item.title: groups Micro.js
item.description: Groups Service The group serivce is a basic CRUD service for groups.

item.title: location Micro.js
item.description: Real time GPS location tracking and search Location Service Send, store and search real time gps point data and tracking info using the location API.

item.title: places Micro.js
item.description: Store and search for points of interest Places Service The places API stores points of interest and enables you to search for places nearby or last visited.

item.title: posts Micro.js
item.description: Build a blog or the foundations of a headless CMS with posts

item.title: routing Micro.js
item.description: Point to point routing directions Routing Service The routing service provides point to point directions

item.title: tags Micro.js
item.description: Tag any resource by savin a tag associated with their ID in the tag service.

item.title: users Micro.js
item.description: A user service for storing accounts and simple auth. Users Service The users service provides user management and authentication so you can easily add them to your own apps without having to build the entire thing from scratch.
